summary: This document contains payroll records and related forms for I. Charles Mathews from his time with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), including salary adjustments, employment verification requests, and payroll authorizations.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the employment of I. Charles Mathews by the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). Included are payroll authorization forms detailing his appointment, salary adjustments, and termination effective December 31, 1978; a request for employment verification sent to the HSCA from a mortgage lender; and internal memos concerning salary adjustments and payroll certifications. Mathews's employment dates ranged from August 1977 to December 1978, with his final position being Special Counsel at a gross annual salary of $30,000. The documents also cover administrative procedures related to payroll and committee staff.
title: Staff Payroll Records related to I. Charles Mathews
